name: Mura-CMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Mura CMS (previously known as Sava CMS) is an open source CMS for ColdFusion.

matches.text: <form novalidate="novalidate" id="sendLogin" name="sendLogin" method="post" action="index.cfm?fuseaction=cLogin.main" onsubmit="javascript:if(document.sendLogin.email.value !=''){return true;}else{return false;}">
